mutants.code:
import difflib

def predict_word(input_text, list_of_words, n=4):
    close_matches = difflib.get_close_matches(input_text.lower(), list_of_words, n=n)
    return close_matches

import difflib

def predict_word(input_text, list_of_words, n=-3):
